title: Transferring Account Questions.
body:
I know that riot has a FAQ for this type of thing, but there was something that i could not find. For example, if i am diamond 5 on NA and transfer to EUW and get plat 3, then decay to plat 5, if and when i transfer back to NA will i get my diamond 5 back?
Weird question i know, but i just want to know. Thanks!

replies.body:
*Lew* is once again spot-on with their assessment of this situation. Your account on the previous server would be subject to normal decay rules after 28 days.  Therefore, if you transferred back months later, your division would likely be lower, however, your MMR (matchmaking rating) would be the same.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

It is explained in their server transfer [FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ#h2q3) that you would get back the rank you were originally at on NA but also with any decay that would occur.
